actions.name: LEVELED_LIST_ACTION_CLICKED
actions.description: An action item on the leveled list component was clicked

actions.name: LEVELED_LIST_RELATED_ACTION_CLICKED
actions.description: A related action item on the leveled list component was clicked

actions.name: LEVELED_LIST_DATA_REFRESH
actions.description: A request to refresh the leveled list data source was dispatched

actions.name: LEVELED_LIST_ROW_CLICKED
actions.description: An action dispatched when a leveled list row record is clicked

uiBuilder.label: Leveled List
uiBuilder.description: A leveled list component displaying parent-child relationships.

properties.name: data
properties.label: Data
properties.description: Parent table data for the component

properties.name: table
properties.label: Primary Table Name
properties.description: The name of the primary table (the name of the table connected to data property)

properties.name: actionItems
properties.label: Action Items
properties.description: Primary data table actions defined in json

properties.name: relatedTable
properties.label: Related Table Name
properties.description: The name of the related table

properties.name: relatedJoinTable
properties.label: Related Join Table Name
properties.description: The name of the related join table

properties.name: relatedTableTitle
properties.label: Related Table Title
properties.description: The value to display in the related list header defaults to related child key

properties.name: relatedParentKey
properties.label: Related Join Parent Key
properties.description: The parent key of the related join table

properties.name: relatedChildKey
properties.label: Related Join Child Key
properties.description: The child key of the related join table

properties.name: relatedActionItems
properties.label: Related Action Items
properties.description: Related table actions defined in json
